```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(cowplot)
io = import('io')

config = io$read_yaml("../../config.yaml")
purity = io$load("../../data/purity.RData")

df = lapply(purity$estimate[config$cohorts], reshape2::melt) %>%
    bind_rows(.id="cohort")

ggplot(df, aes(y=forcats::fct_reorder(cohort, value))) +
    ggstance::geom_boxploth(aes(x=value, fill=cohort),
                            outlier.shape=1, outlier.size=0.2, outlier.alpha=0.5) +
    guides(fill=FALSE) +
    labs(x = "Purity (fraction of cells are cancer cells)",
         y = "Cohort")
```
